name: The Waters (ChrisLHall)
description:
Simple grid-based puzzle game exploring flowing water. An exercise in puzzle design. Created using PuzzleScriptby Increpare, which is an excellent tool for creating browser-based puzzle games without needing to code. Please let me know what you think :)

Mostly up-to-date source: https://gist.github.com/ChrisLHall/d78f45cb08d18b161c2585c7a21490b8
